title: naTarAjO vijayatE
sahitya:
natarAjO vijayatE nata nandi bhrngi shiva gaNa saguNa
nirguNa svarUpa saccidAnanda


anupallavi

  katitha lasita mrdudhara vyAkra carmAmbarO vyAghra pada
patanjali manOratha pUrtti kara harO digambaraha cidambara


caraNam    shashi kalA suratu nI samalankrudAruNa jaTAdharO karaLa nIla kandarO taraha
sita mOhana vitru mAtaraha pashupatir mrga dharO bhaya karOnushrta caturmukha
mAdhava tALa mrdangaha karuNApAngaha shivakAmi hrdayaranga
